info.title: SWR audio lab - Radiohub
info.description:
This documentation is also available as [openapi.json](https://api.lab.swr.de/radiohub-docs/openapi.json) or [openapi.yaml](https://api.lab.swr.de/radiohub-docs/openapi.yaml).

  
Authorization keys can be requested via [lab@swr.de](mailto:lab@swr.de) and shall be sent as base64 encoded basic auth information in the header. Please report all problems or bugs to [lab@swr.de](mailto:lab@swr.de) or via the [Github repo](https://github.com/swrlab/swr-radiohub-docs/issues) and possibly include the `trace` information from the response header or info object.

 The dev environment uses data from the dev database; staging and production environments both access production data. The `appId` therefore follows the same structure. Caching is separate for each stage.

get.summary: Query an entire content collection
get.description: Receive all recent entries for a content collection by their reference.

parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: SWR CMS reference

default.description: If status code other than 200, an error message will be provided, otherwise the cover will be returned as image.

get.summary: Query a content object by id
get.description: Receive a content object by the content id (can be import-sensitive).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Radiohub import ID

default.description: If status code other than 200, an error message will be provided, otherwise the cover will be returned as image.

get.summary: Query a content object by SWR CMS Ref
get.description: Receive a content object by the SWR CMS Reference (Sophora-Ref)

parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: Radiohub import ID

default.description: If status code other than 200, an error message will be provided, otherwise the cover will be returned as image.

get.summary: Get a cover based on SWR's mdid
get.description: Query Radiohub to get a cover for a played item based on a mdid reference.

parameters.name: mdid
parameters.description: SWR mdid (starts with M0...)

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Optionally set a desired width, if no height is provided, the cover stays square-sized, otherwise it will be cropped. Default if unset is 256px, max is 1024px.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Optionally set a desired height, if no width is provided, the cover stays square-sized, otherwise it will be cropped

parameters.name: station
parameters.description: Apply a branding to the image. Branded covers are only available if this station has ever played that track.

default.description: If status code other than 200, an error message will be provided, otherwise the cover will be returned as image.

post.description: Send a feedback message from an external device or platform to SWR's feedback system.

parameters.name: station
parameters.description: Set the radio station for the schedule query

requestBody.description: When posting a feedback entry, `name`, `userId` and `source` are always required, `city` for all stations except _dasding_. Each post needs to contain either `file` or `message`. The field `file` can either be _image/jpeg_ (jpg file), _image/png_ (png image) or _audio/mpeg_ (mp3). `userId` needs to be a predefined token or id which can be used to reach back out to the user.

200.description: If status code other than 200, an error message will be provided, otherwise message is null.

get.summary: Load an image from image service
get.description: Load the original image or resized version. A list of all keys can be seen in the SWR audio lab dashboard. Contact lab@swr.de for access. Uncached images will be generated and served from storage. See response header "swr-datasource" for details. Clients should also respect cache control if possible.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Set key for the image that shall be displayed.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Optional width in pixels that the image shall be resized to. Minimum: 1, maximum 2560px

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Optional height in pixels that the image shall be resized to. Minimum: 1, maximum 2560px. If both width and height are set, then the image will be cropped. Otherwise the respectively opposite dimension is set to auto

parameters.name: fileType
parameters.description: Force the output to a specific file type. If unset, the output will match the input file type.

500.description: Server error occured or key not found.

default.description: Image

servers.description: This service is acessible through the primary path

get.summary: Receive details about a cacheable image
get.description: Similar to the image service endpoint but here only a JSON object of the database entry will be served. Should only be used for debugging solutions, not to download an image. Accessibility of the sourceUrl is not guaranteed and will be limited in future versions.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Set key for the image that shall be displayed. A list of all keys can be seen in the SWR audio lab dashboard. Contact lab@swr.de for access.

500.description: Server error occured or key not found.

default.description: JSON object

servers.description: This service is acessible through the primary path

get.summary: Load an image from swr2 image service
get.description: Load the original image or resized version. A list of all keys can be seen in the SWR audio lab dashboard. Contact lab@swr.de for access. Uncached images will be generated and served from storage. See response header "swr-datasource" for details. Clients should also respect cache control if possible.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Set key for the image that shall be displayed.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Set the aspect ratio for the image. rund is a 1x1 image which is title safe for round usage.

parameters.name: overlay
parameters.description: Toggle whether a swr2 logo overlay shall be included. This feature is end of life and you should always request the 0 version.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Width in pixels that the image shall be resized to

500.description: Server error occured or key not found.

default.description: Image

servers.description: This service is acessible through the primary path

get.summary: Receive details about a cacheable image
get.description: Similar to the swr2 image service endpoint but here only a JSON object of the database entry will be served. Should only be used for debugging solutions, not to download an image. Accessibility of the sourceUrl is not guaranteed and will be limited in future versions.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Set key for the image that shall be displayed. A list of all keys can be seen in the SWR audio lab dashboard. Contact lab@swr.de for access.

500.description: Server error occured or key not found.

default.description: JSON object

servers.description: This service is acessible through the primary path

get.summary: Receive the show that's live as scheduled
get.description: Query Radiohub to get the current live show for a specific station.

parameters.name: station
parameters.description: Set the radio station for the schedule query

default.description: If status code other than 200, an error message will be provided, otherwise message is null.

get.summary: Receive the show that's live as scheduled
get.description: Query Radiohub to get the current live show for a specific station.

parameters.name: station
parameters.description: Set the radio station for the schedule query

parameters.name: day
parameters.description: Specify a certain date to be checked in the format YYYYMMDD.

200.description: If status code other than 200, an error message will be provided, otherwise message is null.

get.summary: Receive the show that's live as scheduled
get.description: Query Radiohub based on a ms or s timestamp to get the show for a specific station.

parameters.name: station
parameters.description: Set the radio station for the schedule query

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Choose whether to use a UNIX timestamp in seconds or milliseconds.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Timestamp in preferred format

default.description: If status code other than 200, an error message will be provided, otherwise message is null.

get.summary: Purge cache information for a station
get.description: Shall only be used in cases when meta information has been changed and needs to be re-cached.

parameters.name: station
parameters.description: Set the radio station for the schedule query

default.description: If status code other than 200, an error message will be provided, otherwise message is null.

get.summary: Start a linear non-interactive radio stream based on station and parameters
get.description:
Linking service to provide the latest streamUrl with certain given parameters.

For SWR classic an additional parameter `isLive` is provided in the JSON output (see example response below).

Some requests require an authentication with special permissions (`swrRadiohubStreamStart`) - Especially responsive radio triggered by the y parameter, those responses also feature a different JSON structure.
Note Interactive radio sessions no longer use this call.

parameters.name: station
parameters.description:
Set the radio station. 

Note that not all stations provide all features such as video oder skippable radio.

parameters.name: r
parameters.description:
_(returnData)_ 

Choose whether to redirect to streamUrl or receive JSON data object.

parameters.name: f
parameters.description:
_(desiredFormat)_ 

Set the streaming format. Note that video is not available in combination with all queries. 

Defaults to mp3.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
_(desiredQuality)_ 

Set the streaming quality. Note that adaptive is only available for f=video while high and low are for mp3/aac.

Defaults to low.

parameters.name: d
parameters.description:
_(deviceType)_ 

Set the type of device and/or aggregator. Example list is not complete and only serves as a reference. Names are provided by SWR audio lab.

500.description: Server error occured or key not found.

default.description: JSON object

x-swrclassic.description: Example of a result where `station` is `swrclassic` to signalize live modus.

message.description: Message will be provided if status is not 200, otherwise null

get.summary: Receive meta information about a current session
get.description: All live information and meta data details that the system knows about a running audio session for the skippable radio platform.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: Provide a valid `appId`.

parameters.name: syncUrl
parameters.description: Provide the ybrid metadata Url to improve sync and buffer handling. Only provide the Url once and as quickly as possible after receiving it from ybrid.

400.description: Query not allowed or appId not provided.

default.description: JSON object

get.summary: Control the timeshift position of a user's stream
get.description: For a detailed workflow of responsive radio streams, see the STREAMING.md document in this repository.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The type of action for the livestream

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: Always provide the user's appId for all responsive radio requests.

400.description: Query not allowed or appId not provided.

500.description: Server error occured or key not found.

default.description: JSON object

get.description: For a detailed workflow of responsive radio streams, see the STREAMING.md document in this repository.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The type of action for the livestream

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: The time difference if required by `action`

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: Always provide the user's appId for all responsive radio requests.

400.description: Query not allowed or appId not provided.

500.description: Server error occured or key not found.

default.description: JSON object

get.summary: Jump to the timeshift position of a specific track type
get.description: For a detailed workflow of responsive radio streams, see the STREAMING.md document in this repository.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The type of action for the livestream

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The track type

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: Always provide the user's appId for all responsive radio requests.

400.description: Query not allowed or appId not provided.

500.description: Server error occured or key not found.

default.description: JSON object

get.summary: Control the content of a user's stream by skipping
get.description: For a detailed workflow of responsive radio streams, see the STREAMING.md document in this repository.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: Always provide the user's appId for all responsive radio requests.

400.description: Query not allowed or appId not provided.

500.description: Server error occured or key not found.

default.description: JSON object

get.summary: Control the content of a user's stream
get.description: For a detailed workflow of responsive radio streams, see the STREAMING.md document in this repository. When switching to a channel, provide the channel id, for podcast series, provide collection reference, for audio content, use the sophora document reference.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The type of action for the livestream

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The time difference if required by `action`

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: Always provide the user's appId for all responsive radio requests.

400.description: Query not allowed or appId not provided

500.description: Server error occured or key not found.

default.description: JSON object

get.summary: Receive the track that's playing right now.
get.description: Query Radiohub to get the current live show for a specific station. Note that tracks currently means song, which may be extended in future versions.

parameters.name: station
parameters.description: Set the radio station for the schedule query

default.description: If status code other than 200, an error message will be provided, otherwise message is null.

get.summary: Search for traffic incidents
get.description: Query ARD Traffic (TPEG) via Radiohub to get a list of incidents.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: Set the ARD partner whose details shall be displayed. Set to ard for full output.

parameters.name: roadName
parameters.description: Comma, separated and url encoded list of road names, like A5 or B10. Capitalization does not matter, however uppercase is preferred.

parameters.name: includeLocation
parameters.description: String-formatted boolean information whether the full GPS location shall be returned. Default if unset: false

default.description: If status code other than 200, an error message will be provided, otherwise message is null.

get.summary: Get the neareast incidents
get.description: Query ARD Traffic (TPEG) via Radiohub to get a list of incidents via supplied geo coordinates.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: Set the ARD partner whose details shall be displayed. Set to ard for full output.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Geo Latitude

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Geo Longitude

parameters.name: includeLocation
parameters.description: String-formatted boolean information whether the full GPS location shall be returned. Default if unset: false.

parameters.name: customRadius
parameters.description: Radius in Kilometers that shall be used. Default if unset: 30.

default.description: If status code other than 200, an error message will be provided, otherwise message is null.

get.summary: Register an user device for appId access
get.description: The `appId` is needed for all responsive radio actions. For a detailed workflow of responsive radio streams, see the STREAMING.md document in this repository.

parameters.name: station
parameters.description: The type of action for the livestream

default.description: JSON object

get.summary: Turn a location search into lat/lon
get.description: Allow users to search for a location to receive lat/lon coordinates for weather queries. Devices are encouraged to save the lat/lon response to avoid having to query this API every time.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Location query

default.description: If status code other than 200, an error message will be provided, otherwise message is null.

post.summary: Turn a location search into lat/lon
post.description: Allow users to search for a location to receive lat/lon coordinates for weather queries. Devices are encouraged to save the lat/lon response to avoid having to query this API every time.

default.description: If status code other than 200, an error message will be provided, otherwise message is null.

get.summary: Get the weather
get.description: Receive SWR's weather report for a specific geolocation.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Geo Latitude

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Geo Longitude

default.description: If status code other than 200, an error message will be provided, otherwise message is null.

id.description: Unique identifier for this content element and import, can be used for further queries.

message.description: Message will be provided if status is not 200, otherwise null
Message will be provided if status is not 200, otherwise null
Message will be provided if status is not 200, otherwise null
Message will be provided if status is not 200, otherwise null
Message will be provided if status is not 200, otherwise null

schedulePurgeResponse.description: Defines a schedule response after purging

message.description: Message will be provided if status is not 200, otherwise null

refPlaylistId.description: Unique ID within a station to reference a played track

refMdId.description: SWR metadata ID to reference a track

durationPlan.description: For how long the track is schedule to be played back on air

message.description: Message will be provided if status is not 200, otherwise null
Message will be provided if status is not 200, otherwise null

trafficResponse_locationBox.description: Bounding box of the entire incident.

urgency.description: Describes the level of the incident. 1 is normal, 2 is a warning.

createdAt.description: UNIX timestamp when the incident was created.

roadName.description: Comma-separated string with all included roads. Usually just one, but in rare cases, can be multiple ones. Can be null if road is not well-known (city street, diversion).

locationType.description: Describes the type of Geo information. Multi* locations include a second point or string (usually the reverse route of a road).

location.description: Geo information for point or line.

distance.description: Only supplied when querying by geo coordinates.

message.description: Message will be provided if status is not 200, otherwise null

isNew.description: Whether the streamUrl has changed since the last meta call. In that case the new Url shall be reloaded in the audio player.

streamMetaResponse_data_meta_channelOpti.description: One or more channels than can be played

streamMetaResponse_data_meta_scheduleNow.description: Schedule item which was on air at the user's playback position

trackList.description: Array of tracks that have been played over the past 4 hours. The most recent one is the first element, after that it goes back in time.
